rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a reception area incorporating Vastu principles of symmetry and balance.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room designed in Mediterranean style with natural light and open layout following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Open dining space adjoining the kitchen area, ensuring a seamless flow between cooking and social spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Mediterranean-style kitchen with efficient workflow and adherence to local building norms.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-equipped guest bathroom ensuring privacy, with Vastu compliant placement for health and prosperity.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage and utility space designed in compliance with local codes.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance door aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Openings to the balcony area enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Large windows strategically placed in each room following Vastu guidelines for optimal sunlight and air circulation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and Mediterranean decor ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for joint family members in a traditional style while maintaining Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for extended family use, incorporating local architectural elements and Vastu considerations.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom (Master)
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom ensuring convenience and privacy.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: A quiet study area for joint family members, designed with natural lighting in mind.

openings.description: Openings to private balconies that offer scenic views while maintaining privacy.
Optimally placed windows for natural light and ventilation following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for joint family members, designed with Mediterranean charm and Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: An extra room ensuring adequate space for a growing family or guest accommodation.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater area with soundproofing and optimal seating arrangements, designed to adhere to local building norms and provide an immersive experience.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A private gym space equipped for various fitness activities, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu guidelines for energy flow.

openings.description: Openings to external balconies offering natural light and ventilation while maintaining acoustic insulation.
Large windows placed strategically for maximum sunlight, airflow, and compliance with Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: A dedicated space on the second floor ensuring convenience and privacy.
Integrated home theater in the top floor offering high-quality audio-visual experiences with soundproofing features.

vastu_considerations.implementation: Rooms and openings are aligned to optimize natural light and air circulation.
Private areas such as master bedrooms, gym, and theater are oriented for minimal disturbance.
